issue.title: [Developer] Add issue_comment workflow to fix lint/style/codegen
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-7801](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-7801). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Like https://github.com/r-lib/actions/tree/master/examples#render-readme. 

- If changes to r/README.Rmd, render readme
- If changes to r/R, render docs
- If changes to r/src, lint.sh --fix
